parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Adverb
str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Adverb
str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Article - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Adverb
str2: Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To disturb, agitate, stir up, trouble. Of uncertain affinity; to stir or agitate.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And not, not even, neither?nor. From me and de; but not, not even; in a continued negation, nor.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To shrink, be fearful, timid, cowardly. From deilia; to be timid.
